title: How to review my request?
body: Hi, my account was stolen a week ago, and I have submit a ticked, but I still dont get a response yet. I sent all information I have about my account, and get only a auto reply with a link to review my request, but I can not review the request without password. It is such a long time and I just want to make sure if my request is work in process. I am Cold Zero from NA, thanks!

replies.body:
Unfortunately when you're recovering an account, your correspondence will all be through email. You won't be able to check on the status or sign into the support site until your account is successfully recovered. We're pretty swamped with tickets, so response times will be a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any questions.
